313:1: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakastāṃ kalyāṇamitrānuśāsanī taṃ ca samantanetraṃ dharmaparyāyamanusmaran,
313:10: anupūrveṇa yena sāgaratīraṃ laṅkāpathastenopasaṃkramya pūrvāṃ diśamavalokayāmāsa supratiṣṭhitasya bhikṣordarśanakāmatayā|
313:11: evaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ paścimāmuttarāmuttarapūrvāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāṃ paścimottarāmadha ūrdhvāṃ diśamavalokayāmāsa supratiṣṭhitasya bhikṣordarśanakāmatayā|
313:17: acintyāṃśca sūkṣmasphuṭavastrameghān gaganatale prītimanobhirmahoragendraiḥ prahitān prasṛtānapaśyat supratiṣṭhitasya bhikṣoḥ spṛhamāṇarūpaiḥ|
313:20: acintyāni ca yakṣendraśatasahasrāṇi saparivārāṇi vikṛtaśarīrāṇi gaganatalagatānapaśyat supratiṣṭhitasya bhikṣormaitryādhipateyatayā|
313:21: acintyāni ca rākṣasendraśatasahasrāṇi saparivārāṇi gaganatale anuparivartamānāni supratiṣṭhitasya bhikṣorārakṣāpratipannānyapaśyat|
313:23: acintyāni ca śuddhāvāsakāyikadevatāśatasahasrāṇi gaganatale vimānagatānyapaśyat supratiṣṭhitasya bhikṣoḥ pūjākarmaṇi||
313:24: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ supratiṣṭhitaṃ bhikṣuṃ gaganatale caṃkramyamāṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ prāñjaliḥ supratiṣṭhitaṃ bhikṣuṃ namaskṛtya evamāha-mayā ārya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam|
313:25: na ca jānāmi-kathaṃ bodhisattvena buddhadharmā anveṣṭavyāḥ?
313:35: śrutaṃ ca ma āryo bodhisattvānāmavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti|
313:36: tadvadatu me āryaḥ-kathaṃ bodhisattvena buddhadharmeṣu prayoktavyam,
313:47: evamukte supratiṣṭhito bhikṣuḥ sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat-sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
313:48: yastvamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya buddhadharmān sarvajñatādharmān svayaṃbhūdharmān paripṛcchasi|
313:50: etaṃ me kulaputra asaṅgamukhaṃ bodhisattvavimokṣamāyūhatā niryūhatā anusaratā vibhajatā vicinvatā pravicinvatā pratibhāsayatā prabhāsayatā asaṅgakoṭirnāma jñānālokaḥ pratilabdhaḥ,
313:61: asyāhaṃ kulaputra anabhisaṃskārikāyā ṛddheranubhāvena iha gaganatale caṃkramāmi,
313:71: tiraḥkuḍyaṃ tiraḥprākāramasajjan gacchāmi tadyathāpi nāma ākāśe|
313:72: ākāśe'pi paryaṅkena kramāmi tadyathāpi nāma pakṣī śakuniḥ|
313:77: imāvapi candrasūryau evaṃ maharddhikau evaṃ mahānubhāvau evaṃ mahaujasvinau pāṇinā saṃparimārjayāmi|
313:81: anantavarṇaprabhājālameghān pramuñcan samantāddiśo niryāmi-yaduta pūrvāṃ diśaṃ niryāmi,
313:82: dakṣiṇāṃ paścimāmuttarāmuttarapūrvāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāṃ paścimottarāmadha urdhvāmapi diśaṃ niryāmi|
313:83: ekaikena cittakṣeṇena pūrvasyāṃ diśi ekaṃ lokadhātumatikramāmi|
313:84: dvāvapi daśāpi lokadhātuśatamapi lokadhātusahasramapi lokadhātuśatasahasramapi lokadhātukoṭīmapi lokadhātukoṭīśatamapi lokadhātukoṭīsahasramapi lokadhatukoṭīśatasahasramapi lokadhātukoṭīniyutaśatasahasramapi,
313:86: asaṃkhyeyānapi acintyānapi atulyānapi amāpyānapi asamantānapi aparyantānapi asīmāprāptānapi anabhilāpyānabhilāpyānapi lokadhātūnatikramāmi|
313:87: ye ca teṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
313:99: teṣu teṣu lokadhātuparṣanmaṇḍaleṣu ye buddhābhagavanto dharmaṃdeśayanti,
313:100: teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmekaikaṃ tathāgatamanantabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamaiḥ kāyanānātvairekaikena kāyena anantabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamaiḥ pūjāmeghaiḥ pravarṣannupasaṃkramāmi|
313:101: upasaṃkramya pūjāṃ karomyapratiprasrabdhaḥ sarvapuṣpaiḥ sarvagandhaiḥ sarvamālyaiḥ sarvavilepanaiḥ sarvavastraiḥ sarvadhvajaiḥ sarvapatākābhiḥ sarvavitānaiḥ sarvajālaiḥ sarvavigrahaiḥ|
313:102: yacca te buddha bhagavanto bhāṣante deśayanti udīrayanti saṃprakāśayanti saṃvarṇayanti paridīpayanti upadiśanti nirdiśanti prabhāvayanti,
313:104: yā ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhakṣetrapariśuddhistāṃ sarvāmanusmarāmi|
313:106: evameva dakṣiṇāyāṃ paścimāyāmuttarāyāmuttarapūrvāyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇāyāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ paścimottarāyāmadha ūrdhvāyāṃ diśi ekamapi lokadhātumatikramāmi|
313:108: ye ca teṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
313:109: teṣu teṣu lokadhātusamudreṣu tāsu tāsu lokadhātuviśuddhiṣu,
313:110: yāvat teṣu teṣu lokadhātuṣu parṣanmaṇḍaleṣu dharmaṃ deśayanti,
313:112: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāṃ pūjāṃ karomi sarvapuṣpairyāvatsarvaparigrahaiḥ|
313:113: yacca te buddhā bhagavanto bhāṣante yāvatprabhāvayanti tatsarvamājānāmi udgṛhṇāmi|
313:114: yā ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhakṣetrapariśuddhistāṃ sarvāmanusmarāmi|
313:119: sūkṣmā vā udārā vā hīnā vā praṇītā vā sukhitā vā duḥkhitā vā,
313:121: ye ca sattvā māmupasaṃkrāmanti tān sarvānatraiva samantajave'moghavikramaparyavasāne bodhisattvavimokṣe pratiṣṭhāpayāmi|
313:122: etamahaṃ kulaputra samantajavaṃ tathāgatapūjopasthānaprayogaṃ sarvasattvaparipākānukūlamasaṅgamukhaṃ bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ prajānāmi|
313:123: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mahākaruṇāśīlānāṃ mahāyānapratipattiśīlānāṃ bodhisattvamārgāvipravāsaśīlānāsaṅgaśīlānāṃ bodhisattvāśayagarbhāvipātanaśīlānāṃ bodhicittāparityāgaśīlānāṃ buddhadharmādhyālambanaśīlānāṃ sarvajñatāmanasikārāvipravasitaśīlānāṃ gaganasamaśīlānāṃ sarvalokāniśritaśīlānāmavinaṣṭaśīlāmanupahataśīlānāmakhaṇḍaśīlānāmacchidraśīlānāmaśabalaśīlānāmakalmāṣaśīlānāṃ viśuddhaśīlānāṃ virajonirmalaśīlānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ caryā jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum||
313:127: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha-kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
313:129: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreiṣṭhidārakaḥ supratiṣṭhitasya bhikṣoḥ pādau śirasābhivandya supratiṣṭhitaṃ bhikṣumanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya supratiṣṭhitasya bhikṣorantikāt prakrāntaḥ||4||
